item.description:
That's right, for those mid-week party animals, Boston Events Guide is throwing a summer party cruise, with DJ's, dancing and an after-party with a live band.

Cruise starts boarding at 7:15, and sails at 8 pm from the Seaport district in Boston. After party is included in the price and runs from 11-1 am.

The sweet deal is that the price is a wee 20 bucks, and if ya find a buddy to join you, it's 2 for 35 through Aug 29th. Thirty bucks at the gate.

Click below for details and to order tickets. Tickets are available online with id required for pick-up on the 29th.

http://www.bostoneven...


For more details and directions, check out Bay State cruises site:

http://www.baystatecr...

I'll be grabbing nachos next door at the Seaport Bar and Grill at 6 pm (in the bar) if anyone wishes to join me for dinner. Otherwise will plan to hover at the gate where you pick up your tix b/w 7:15-7:30.

Contact Lisa (vetchick) with any questions.
item.name: Summer Party Cruise
